And stop linking to others torrent moron!

I just happened to download one of your torrents and I was impressed with the quality:size ratio, so I grabbed a few others you've encoded including this one and it's very nice work. You seem to have found the sweet spot in terms of picture quality and file size... most 1080's and 720's are much larger than yours, but there's no blocking or pixelation at all that I've seen, and you seem to be doing movies that aren't well represented in high resolution which is also very nice! Thanks for all the work. I'm sure it takes quite a bit of time to do these.
2mbps seems a little low for a 1080p...  hope you did 2 pass...
Maybe moeburn1 is used to XviD format. x264 only requires about 65% of the bitrate that XviD does.
Great quality, thx for ther up m8

By the way, anoXmous, I just took a look at your link, and anyone who knows much about encoding can see from the stats you listed that your claim is demonstrably untrue. First of all, your audio bitrate was horrific. Digital, or "CD" quality audio is 160kbps and yours was under 70kbps. Secondly, your video bitrate was 937kbps, which normally is good enough for most films shot on conventional media, but when you have a very grainy source like this (or Clerks, or Beasts of the Southern Wild which was shot on 16mm film) you have to use a higher bitrate because of the grain. If you don't, you end up with blocks and pixelation in dark scenes, which is what I saw on your encode of Dances with Wolves Extended, and probably is present on your version of this as well. So I'll say again, please don't come over here and dishonestly claim that you have superior quality when it's already been demonstrated that you don't, in multiple cases. 

For anyone who might prefer to have this in 720p instead of 1080p, here's the link to my 720p which doesn't suffer from bitrate problems like anoXmous' link:

http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8254816/Der_Untergang_%28Downfall%29_%282004%29_%5B720p%5D_x264_-_Jalucian
Finally someone understands encoding! Halelujah! Thanks for the upload my friend. After seeing the meme so damn many times I figured it's time to see the movie it came from.

^^ What axprodigy1 said. Not only are Jalucian's better than anoXmous' most of the time, but they're actually better than YIFY's as well. I even noticed that anoXmous, on his newer posts, seems to have upped his video bitrates to "Jalucian standards." lol They were a little on the low size up until recently. I don't know if that's coincidence or not, but I have a feeling it's not. Aint competition wonderful?
